mapper.select: select fb.febmaintitle, fb.febtitle, fb.febcolumnid, fb.febcontent, fc.febcolumntitle, fcc.febcolumncategorytitle, fb.febColumnCategoryid from febboard fb inner join febcolumn fc on fb.febcolumnid = fc.febcolumnid inner join febcolumncategory fcc on fb.febcolumncategoryid = fcc.febcolumncategoryid;

select fb.febmaintitle, fb.febtitle, fb.febcolumnid, fb.febcontent, fc.febcolumntitle, fcc.febcolumncategorytitle, fb.febColumnCategoryid from febboard fb inner join febcolumn fc on fb.febcolumnid = fc.febcolumnid inner join febcolumncategory fcc on fb.febcolumncategoryid = fcc.febcolumncategoryid;
